hackathon.description: Events where developers collaborate intensively on software projects, usually with a competitive aspect.
hackathon.name: Hackathon

marketing.description: Activities and strategies for promoting and selling products or services, including market research and advertising.
marketing.name: Marketing

developer.description: Individuals or teams involved in creating and maintaining software applications.
developer.name: Developer

open-source.description: Software for which the original source code is made freely available and may be redistributed and modified.
open-source.name: Open Source

technical-content.description: Content focused on technical subjects, such as coding tutorials, software documentation, and technical blogs.
technical-content.name: Technical Content

general-content.description: Content that covers a broad range of topics, not limited to any specific field or industry.
general-content.name: General Content

partnership.description: Collaborative agreements between organizations or individuals to achieve mutual goals.
partnership.name: Partnership

event.description: Planned public or social occasions, such as conferences, meetups, and workshops.
event.name: Event
